reviewText: His most poweful, most relevant  book

This is a very powerful combination. It furthered my understanding of Christianity in an intelligent, well thought out presentation that was written for an ordinary person, not a philosopher. I am grateful for what I learned as it is helping me to grow spiritually.
Excellent summary of a great work.
Presenters in the video do a great job discussing the thought C S Lewis put into his writing in a compelling and engaging way.

Highly recommended as a supplement to reading the book.  However, READ THE BOOK!!!
Howard Russell
Overland Park, Kansas
